Summary: Saw UFO during eclipse on Tuesday morning AM have a film of event
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around June 28th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside to watch lunar eclipse as soon as the moon completely disappeared.I decided to look and see how bright the stars were without the moonlight.I looked up a saw the Orion belt.As soon as I looked down toward the tops of the trees i noticed these lights blinking .They were red ,white ,and blue.So at first I assumed they were an airplane but I noticed they weren't moving anywhere.But just sitting about a hundred feet above tree line.So i got my camera out that I had for the eclipse and started filming.The strange part about all this is for the whole time I was filming I could see it the entire time with my naked eye.But on the film it looks like it had disappeared and was changing shapes.Now this thing was about 150 yards from where I was standing.I filmed it for about 5 Min's before my battery ran out on my camera which is also strange because i had only filmed with it maybe a total of 20 Min's .And I had just taken it off the charger before we had gone outside so it was fully charged.It has always lasted about 3 hours before this time.Any ways we stayed outside a good hour and what ever it was just hovered over those trees.I didn't hear any noise.SO thats about it I was tired we went inside and i emailed someone with mufon they told me to report it here so there you go.
